AssociateRoleToGroup.name: AssociateRoleToGroup
AssociateRoleToGroup.description:
Grants permission to associate a role with a group. The role's permissions must allow
                                                Greengrass core Lambda functions and connectors to perform actions in other AWS services.

AssociateServiceRoleToAccount.name: AssociateServiceRoleToAccount
AssociateServiceRoleToAccount.description:
Grants permission to associate a role with your account. AWS IoT Greengrass uses this
                                                role to access your Lambda functions and AWS IoT resources.

CreateConnectorDefinition.name: CreateConnectorDefinition
CreateConnectorDefinition.description: Grants permission to create  a connector definition.

CreateConnectorDefinitionVersion.name: CreateConnectorDefinitionVersion
CreateConnectorDefinitionVersion.description: Grants permission to create a version of an existing connector definition.

CreateCoreDefinition.name: CreateCoreDefinition
CreateCoreDefinition.description: Grants permission to create a core definition.

CreateCoreDefinitionVersion.name: CreateCoreDefinitionVersion
CreateCoreDefinitionVersion.description:
Grants permission to create a version of an existing core definition. Greengrass groups
                                                must each contain exactly one Greengrass core.

CreateDeployment.name: CreateDeployment
CreateDeployment.description: Grants permission to create a deployment.

CreateDeviceDefinition.name: CreateDeviceDefinition
CreateDeviceDefinition.description: Grants permission to create a device definition.

CreateDeviceDefinitionVersion.name: CreateDeviceDefinitionVersion
CreateDeviceDefinitionVersion.description: Grants permission to create a version of an existing device definition.

CreateFunctionDefinition.name: CreateFunctionDefinition
CreateFunctionDefinition.description:
Grants permission to create a Lambda function definition to be used in a group that
                                                contains a list of Lambda functions and their configurations.

CreateFunctionDefinitionVersion.name: CreateFunctionDefinitionVersion
CreateFunctionDefinitionVersion.description: Grants permission to create a version of an existing Lambda function definition.

CreateGroup.name: CreateGroup
CreateGroup.description: Grants permission to create a group.

CreateGroupCertificateAuthority.name: CreateGroupCertificateAuthority
CreateGroupCertificateAuthority.description: Grants permission to create a CA for the group, or rotate the existing CA.

CreateGroupVersion.name: CreateGroupVersion
CreateGroupVersion.description: Grants permission to create a version of a group that has already been defined.

CreateLoggerDefinition.name: CreateLoggerDefinition
CreateLoggerDefinition.description: Grants permission to create a logger definition.

CreateLoggerDefinitionVersion.name: CreateLoggerDefinitionVersion
CreateLoggerDefinitionVersion.description: Grants permission to create a version of an existing logger definition.

CreateResourceDefinition.name: CreateResourceDefinition
CreateResourceDefinition.description:
Grants permission to create a resource definition that contains a list of resources
                                                to be used in a group.

CreateResourceDefinitionVersion.name: CreateResourceDefinitionVersion
CreateResourceDefinitionVersion.description: Grants permission to create a version of an existing resource definition.

CreateSoftwareUpdateJob.name: CreateSoftwareUpdateJob
CreateSoftwareUpdateJob.description:
Grants permission to create an AWS IoT job that will trigger your Greengrass cores
                                                to update the software they are running.

CreateSubscriptionDefinition.name: CreateSubscriptionDefinition
CreateSubscriptionDefinition.description: Grants permission to create a subscription definition.

CreateSubscriptionDefinitionVersion.name: CreateSubscriptionDefinitionVersion
CreateSubscriptionDefinitionVersion.description: Grants permission to create a version of an existing subscription definition.

DeleteConnectorDefinition.name: DeleteConnectorDefinition
DeleteConnectorDefinition.description: Grants permission to delete a connector definition.

DeleteCoreDefinition.name: DeleteCoreDefinition
DeleteCoreDefinition.description:
Grants permission to delete a core definition. Deleting a definition that is currently
                                                in use in a deployment affects future deployments.

DeleteDeviceDefinition.name: DeleteDeviceDefinition
DeleteDeviceDefinition.description:
Grants permission to delete a device definition. Deleting a definition that is currently
                                                in use in a deployment affects future deployments.

DeleteFunctionDefinition.name: DeleteFunctionDefinition
DeleteFunctionDefinition.description:
Grants permission to delete a Lambda function definition. Deleting a definition that
                                                is currently in use in a deployment affects future deployments.

DeleteGroup.name: DeleteGroup
DeleteGroup.description: Grants permission to delete a group that is not currently in use in a deployment.

DeleteLoggerDefinition.name: DeleteLoggerDefinition
DeleteLoggerDefinition.description:
Grants permission to delete a logger definition. Deleting a definition that is currently
                                                in use in a deployment affects future deployments.

DeleteResourceDefinition.name: DeleteResourceDefinition
DeleteResourceDefinition.description: Grants permission to delete a resource definition.

DeleteSubscriptionDefinition.name: DeleteSubscriptionDefinition
DeleteSubscriptionDefinition.description:
Grants permission to delete a subscription definition. Deleting a definition that
                                                is currently in use in a deployment affects future deployments.

DisassociateRoleFromGroup.name: DisassociateRoleFromGroup
DisassociateRoleFromGroup.description: Grants permission to disassociate the role from a group.

DisassociateServiceRoleFromAccount.name: DisassociateServiceRoleFromAccount
DisassociateServiceRoleFromAccount.description:
Grants permission to disassociate the service role from an account. Without a service
                                                role, deployments will not work.

Discover.name: Discover
Discover.description: Grants permission to retrieve information required to connect to a Greengrass core.

GetAssociatedRole.name: GetAssociatedRole
GetAssociatedRole.description: Grants permission to retrieve the role associated with a group.

GetBulkDeploymentStatus.name: GetBulkDeploymentStatus
GetBulkDeploymentStatus.description: Grants permission to return the status of a bulk deployment.

GetConnectivityInfo.name: GetConnectivityInfo
GetConnectivityInfo.description: Grants permission to retrieve the connectivity information for a core.

GetConnectorDefinition.name: GetConnectorDefinition
GetConnectorDefinition.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a connector definition.

GetConnectorDefinitionVersion.name: GetConnectorDefinitionVersion
GetConnectorDefinitionVersion.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a connector definition version.

GetCoreDefinition.name: GetCoreDefinition
GetCoreDefinition.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a core definition.

GetCoreDefinitionVersion.name: GetCoreDefinitionVersion
GetCoreDefinitionVersion.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a core definition version.

GetDeploymentStatus.name: GetDeploymentStatus
GetDeploymentStatus.description: Grants permission to return the status of a deployment.

GetDeviceDefinition.name: GetDeviceDefinition
GetDeviceDefinition.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a device definition.

GetDeviceDefinitionVersion.name: GetDeviceDefinitionVersion
GetDeviceDefinitionVersion.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a device definition version.

GetFunctionDefinition.name: GetFunctionDefinition
GetFunctionDefinition.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about a Lambda function definition, such
                                                as its creation time and latest version.

GetFunctionDefinitionVersion.name: GetFunctionDefinitionVersion
GetFunctionDefinitionVersion.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about a Lambda function definition version,
                                                such as which Lambda functions are included in the version and their configurations.

GetGroup.name: GetGroup
GetGroup.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a group.

GetGroupCertificateAuthority.name: GetGroupCertificateAuthority
GetGroupCertificateAuthority.description: Grants permission to return the public key of the CA associated with a group.

GetGroupCertificateConfiguration.name: GetGroupCertificateConfiguration
GetGroupCertificateConfiguration.description: Grants permission to retrieve the current configuration for the CA used by a group.

GetGroupVersion.name: GetGroupVersion
GetGroupVersion.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a group version.

GetLoggerDefinition.name: GetLoggerDefinition
GetLoggerDefinition.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a logger definition.

GetLoggerDefinitionVersion.name: GetLoggerDefinitionVersion
GetLoggerDefinitionVersion.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a logger definition version.

GetResourceDefinition.name: GetResourceDefinition
GetResourceDefinition.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about a resource definition, such as its
                                                creation time and latest version.

GetResourceDefinitionVersion.name: GetResourceDefinitionVersion
GetResourceDefinitionVersion.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about a resource definition version, such
                                                as which resources are included in the version.

GetServiceRoleForAccount.name: GetServiceRoleForAccount
GetServiceRoleForAccount.description: Grants permission to retrieve the service role that is attached to an account.

GetSubscriptionDefinition.name: GetSubscriptionDefinition
GetSubscriptionDefinition.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a subscription definition.

GetSubscriptionDefinitionVersion.name: GetSubscriptionDefinitionVersion
GetSubscriptionDefinitionVersion.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a subscription definition version.

ListBulkDeploymentDetailedReports.name: ListBulkDeploymentDetailedReports
ListBulkDeploymentDetailedReports.description:
Grants permission to retrieve a paginated list of the deployments that have been started
                                                in a bulk deployment operation and their current deployment status.

ListBulkDeployments.name: ListBulkDeployments
ListBulkDeployments.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of bulk deployments.

ListConnectorDefinitionVersions.name: ListConnectorDefinitionVersions
ListConnectorDefinitionVersions.description: Grants permission to list the versions of a connector definition.

ListConnectorDefinitions.name: ListConnectorDefinitions
ListConnectorDefinitions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of connector definitions.

ListCoreDefinitionVersions.name: ListCoreDefinitionVersions
ListCoreDefinitionVersions.description: Grants permission to list the versions of a core definition.

ListCoreDefinitions.name: ListCoreDefinitions
ListCoreDefinitions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of core definitions.

ListDeployments.name: ListDeployments
ListDeployments.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of all deployments for a group.

ListDeviceDefinitionVersions.name: ListDeviceDefinitionVersions
ListDeviceDefinitionVersions.description: Grants permission to list the versions of a device definition.

ListDeviceDefinitions.name: ListDeviceDefinitions
ListDeviceDefinitions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of device definitions.

ListFunctionDefinitionVersions.name: ListFunctionDefinitionVersions
ListFunctionDefinitionVersions.description: Grants permission to list the versions of a Lambda function definition.

ListFunctionDefinitions.name: ListFunctionDefinitions
ListFunctionDefinitions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of Lambda function definitions.

ListGroupCertificateAuthorities.name: ListGroupCertificateAuthorities
ListGroupCertificateAuthorities.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of current CAs for a group.

ListGroupVersions.name: ListGroupVersions
ListGroupVersions.description: Grants permission to list the versions of a group.

ListGroups.name: ListGroups
ListGroups.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of groups.

ListLoggerDefinitionVersions.name: ListLoggerDefinitionVersions
ListLoggerDefinitionVersions.description: Grants permission to list the versions of a logger definition.

ListLoggerDefinitions.name: ListLoggerDefinitions
ListLoggerDefinitions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of logger definitions.

ListResourceDefinitionVersions.name: ListResourceDefinitionVersions
ListResourceDefinitionVersions.description: Grants permission to list the versions of a resource definition.

ListResourceDefinitions.name: ListResourceDefinitions
ListResourceDefinitions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of resource definitions.

ListSubscriptionDefinitionVersions.name: ListSubscriptionDefinitionVersions
ListSubscriptionDefinitionVersions.description: Grants permission to list the versions of a subscription definition.

ListSubscriptionDefinitions.name: ListSubscriptionDefinitions
ListSubscriptionDefinitions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of subscription definitions.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list the tags for a resource.

ResetDeployments.name: ResetDeployments
ResetDeployments.description: Grants permission to reset a group's deployments.

StartBulkDeployment.name: StartBulkDeployment
StartBulkDeployment.description: Grants permission to deploy multiple groups in one operation.

StopBulkDeployment.name: StopBulkDeployment
StopBulkDeployment.description: Grants permission to stop the execution of a bulk deployment.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add tags to a resource.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a resource.

UpdateConnectivityInfo.name: UpdateConnectivityInfo
UpdateConnectivityInfo.description:
Grants permission to update the connectivity information for a Greengrass core. Any
                                                devices that belong to the group that has this core will receive this information
                                                in order to find the location of the core and connect to it.

UpdateConnectorDefinition.name: UpdateConnectorDefinition
UpdateConnectorDefinition.description: Grants permission to update a connector definition.

UpdateCoreDefinition.name: UpdateCoreDefinition
UpdateCoreDefinition.description: Grants permission to update a core definition.

UpdateDeviceDefinition.name: UpdateDeviceDefinition
UpdateDeviceDefinition.description: Grants permission to update a device definition.

UpdateFunctionDefinition.name: UpdateFunctionDefinition
UpdateFunctionDefinition.description: Grants permission to update a Lambda function definition.

UpdateGroup.name: UpdateGroup
UpdateGroup.description: Grants permission to update a group.

UpdateGroupCertificateConfiguration.name: UpdateGroupCertificateConfiguration
UpdateGroupCertificateConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update the certificate expiry time for a group.

UpdateLoggerDefinition.name: UpdateLoggerDefinition
UpdateLoggerDefinition.description: Grants permission to update a logger definition.

UpdateResourceDefinition.name: UpdateResourceDefinition
UpdateResourceDefinition.description: Grants permission to update a resource definition.

UpdateSubscriptionDefinition.name: UpdateSubscriptionDefinition
UpdateSubscriptionDefinition.description: Grants permission to update a subscription definition.
